[[File:A Minecraft Movie DLC key art.jpeg|alt=Key art.|thumb]]

'''A Minecraft Movie DLC''' is a [[Marketplace]] map centered around playing different minigames in {{AMCM|Game Over World}}.

== Summary ==
The map opens on a start button. Once pressed, the logos for [[Spark Universe]], [[Warner Bros. Pictures]], [[Mojang Studios]], and {{AMCM}} appear one after each other. Afterwards, the camera pans to the player entering {{AMCM|Game Over World}}, featuring dialogue from {{AMCM|Garrett}}.

== Quotes ==

=== External ===
{{Quote|Adventure deeper into A MINECRAFT MOVIE! Compete in elytra races, survive the night, and sneak into a woodland mansion in this free DLC.|Marketplace description}}

{{Quote|Enter the arcade and compete in elytra races, survive the night, and sneak into a woodland mansion! Play iconic moments from the film in A MINECRAFT MOVIE DLC and see if you can reach the top of the leaderboard, whether you bring along friends or play with the heroes from the movie.|[[Cristina Anderca]]<ref>{{Mcnet|a-minecraft-movie-out-now|A MINECRAFT MOVIE: OUT NOW|April 4, 2025|Cristina Anderca}}</ref>}}

=== Internal ===

==== Intro ====
* "Welcome to Game Over World! I know. Awesome."
* "Hope you're up for a challenge, the Garbage Man has new games in store."
* "Check out my arcade machines and test 'em."
* "Just like in life, high scores means prizes"
* "And if you're REALLY good, maybe you'll get an invite to our launch party!"

==== Garrett ====
* "Checked out each game yet? My favourite is the cube one."
* "The games I've made are totally not inspired by real events. Totally."
* "Got all the rewards yet? You need a high score so you might wanna get some reps in."
* "No participation award here, only HIGH SCORE AWARDS!"
* "Time for a protein break?"
* "You can play as my buddy Steve in these games!"
* "Sorry, no autographs."
* "Not all of can be pros."
* "If you get a high score maybe we can be friends."
* "Hot Garbage Tip: Grab a flyer for my mentorship program before you leave."
* "Hot Garbage Tip: Only with a high score can you truly take out the trash."
* "Hot Garbage Tip: Remember, there are two "I"s in WINNING."
* "Hot Garbage Tip: Start winning those high scores if you want to win at life."
